author: Alexander Morales
comment: This was one of the best watch faces I had used. Loved the customization with colors, widgets, and the power saver mode made for great battery life! However when I switched to a new phone and everything from the watch to the app and android wear updated & upon trying to pair no matter how many times I reinstall and repair and resync everything the watch face doesn't appear in android wear :( . This is on the Moto 360 2 but I think the issue is with either Android Wear or this watch face app.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Hi Alexander thanks for the good feedback. Sorry to hear you're having issues send me an email flyingrhinodev@gmail.com let's see what we can do to get it working like it should

title: Favorite watch face, when it used to appear...

author: Krister Holmberg
comment: I originally couldn't use the face because my Huawei Watch was stuck on an old version of Google Play Services but Jose (the dev) helped me get it up to speed. Now I can use the face but the app isn't showing in my app drawer so I'm stuck with red. Hopefully there's a fix. Jose has veen very responsive so I have high hopes. If so I'll update this review.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: I got your email at 3 am today and I just replied back please view the email and get back  to me

title: Doesn't Show In App Drawer / Unable To Open Or Use

author: Isaiah ii
comment: Great face.  My favorite thing about this face is I get absolutely stellar battery life while using it.  I've bought a lot of faces and I normally never get more than 30 hours on my Huawei watch and usually less than 30 but with this face I get over 40 hours and that's with using always on and max brightness. It's a great indoors face as well since it's dark.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Isaiah thanks for the positive review are you not able to access the settings via Android wear then choose the face then click gear icon face settings?

author: David K.
comment: Much like the minimus360, each iteration of updates is making this watch face worse. So much more bugs now. Watch face doesn't load after watch has restarted/powered back on. Glitches with the colour scheme from time to time and battery life of the watch is now worse than before..

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: David real sorry to hear that I'd be happy to refund if your still not happy. People scream for new features so faces have to evolve.  I can look into more detail about the battery drain your having.  Have you updated recently?  What version on watch are you running does it start with a 9?

title: Getting worse with each update

author: cooley
comment: Love this and the easy simple customization exactly, what I wanted. But weather isn't working. Google now weather is on. Enabled on the watch. Downloaded other weather apps for my Huawei watch still won't show weather. Will update once I either figure it out or an answer is given................................. EDIT: got it to show weather. Using custom rom/kernel on my Huawei watch. Had to reflash everything clean and ensure the weather app was working and put watch face on working perfect now.
title: Weather??

author: Chad Swank
comment: I like the watch face and the custom options.  However the app is a little buggy and the weather does not work on my LG Urbane with OnePlus One phone.  It does work with other watch faces that I've used.  Going to try my first refund in play store.  If the weather works in the future, may try it again.
title: Weather doesn't work

author: Graham Williams
comment: Very impressed with this watchface, but more impressed with the developer. Initially had installation problems which he worked hard to resolve for me. Turned out to be an outdated Play Services on my watch. He certainly went beyond to help. Will  be watching his progress and wish him all the best.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Thanks Graham enjoy the watch face

title: Excellent, new favourite

author: Øyvind Buljo
comment: Like it, but I'm not able to change the background. It appears as very light grey on my watch, polar m600. Kind of ruins the whole watch face. Would be great if I just could set the background to black.

author: Armando Garibay
comment: After 1 year of have this watch face it was the best. But now thanks android wear 2.0 it kind of screw it up. It was on the zenwatch 2 and instead of the it being a square, its a circle. And males it look small.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Armando can you send me an email I'd like to find out what the issue is. Thanks

author: Daniel Bennett
comment: I have a ZenWatch 2. The watch face shows up, but none of my changes take effect. Can only use standard colors.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Daniel can you contact me flyingrhinodev@gmail.com

title: Can't make changes on watch

author: Christopher McKee
comment: Looked like a nice watchface, and as I received a code I figured I'd try it out. I have since uninstalled it though. I guess if you wanted your watchface stock, it would be fine, but in trying to customize the colors on mine, absolutely nothing I did was appearing on my watch. No matter how I went about applying the fixes, no update. Then to make matters worse, I closed the app in hopes that this would clear it up, but when I opened it again I was unable to load the preset that I had saved. Waste of an hour, but at least it wasn't a waste of my money as well.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Christopher please email me flyingrhinodev@gmail.com I'd like to fix your issue and trouble shoot. I know your received a free code but I don't want that to deter you from trying others.

author: Alexander Toshkov
comment: The watch face is great. If your having trouble seeing it in your android wear app, keep in mind that the Google Play service on your watch have to be updated to at least 9.2.56
title: Very cool!

author: Woodrowe Bones
comment: The only issue I have is that the steps widget doesn't update. If I tap the widget it shows me how many steps I've done but the widget on the watch face always says 0
title: Great watch face with one issue

author: Dustin Lagrange
comment: No settings options, not customizable. Unable to get a refund after only 5 minutes from purchase.

author: William Sganga
comment: Purchased, installed, running Android wear 2.0 on the LG Watch R, doesn't show up on the watch face list, refunded, Uninstall, re purchase... Re install... Still same issue... Now I cannot refund it as the time has lapsed... Will raise star count once it works... *** update, the face now works, looks clean, works well, only down side is it is dark, so outdoors is a bit annoying, other than that, great work!

author: Haish Ambarkar
comment: Hi just wanna tell you that this app is very nice and clean I loved it so much but recently I got a problem, I have updated my phone to android 7.1 nugget after installing it I am not able to see this watch face in my phone or watch, though its showing its installed but unable to see it or apply it. I hope you could help me to resolve this issue so I can give you 5 stars.

author: Jason Dutterer
comment: I love this watch face. My only issue is the step counter is stuck on yesterday's step count. Otherwise I greatly enjoy this face and the ability to customize it to my liking!

author: Matt Fischer
comment: Screenshots look amazing but the designer is a mess, cant see previews to properly configure and results on watch don't match settings. Huawei Watch...

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Matt can you contact me let's sort out this mess flyingrhinodev@gmail.com

title: Unable to Configure

author: Channing Wu
comment: Love this watch face but the ambient mode is too bad. Please improve. Thank you

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Hi you have 3 different ambient modes in settings did you try those?

title: Ambient mode too bad

author: Vaishakh Salyan
comment: Each and every time I select Stealth 360 watch face I get a message stating " app unexpectedly stopped. If I reinstall the app it works for sometime and again I get the same message. Waste of money.

author: bp Lynch
comment: I have an LG v20 phone and my wAtch is moto 360 but I can not get weather to Work on watch

author: Winsor Perry
comment: A year later and still a lot of issue with Android Wear 2.0... can't change watch face

author: Stuyo
comment: Does not show in app drawer and have only red as color - cannot configure. This happened recently, before it was my favourite watch face.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Settings are in android wear click on face and you see this gear icon. hit that gear and you'll see the settings

author: Nitai Sarna
comment: Can't use it right now.... Please fix!!!
title: Stopped working on Android Wear 2.0 DP3

author: Bhaskarjyoti Hazarika
comment: Wow... What a piece of work. Completely customisable. Finally I got something which I can change according to my mood. One of the best faces I have ever used.

author: rusty gh
comment: Really nice face, super good battery life. Great dim face. I found the setting with-in the wear app. Loving this one! 😀

comment: Restarting my phone countless time still there is no changes after i tweaks setting and use custom preset.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Hi Roslan the settings are in the android wear app click on the face the gear and you'll see all settings

title: How to tweak the setting?

author: s bx
comment: Love the update and the design. But i am not using it until a full coloured ambient mode is available.

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: oh its here! ambient mode options and other new improvements and additions. Make sure you hit that update button when you get it to enjoy the goodness. :)

author: David Motley
comment: Step count doesn't actually show on the watch face. It always defaults to zero. Pretty good otherwise....

author: Wayne Noneyabiz
comment: Love it. If your looking for a clean face with just a little standout accent color, this is a good choice.
title: Clean and simple

author: Chiang Mai Pathomporn
comment: How can I access the phone app to customize the watch? I am using Samsung galaxy s7 edge

author: Jason Gotsch
comment: Looks great, just wish it was brighter. Can't see anything in the sun.

author: Stephen bottoms
comment: Very nice but it's there a way to keep the screen on for longer before going into ambient mode?

reply.author: FlyingRhinoCMG
reply.content: Hi Stephen I currently don't have plans for that option but you can use an app called staylit wear that has tons of options for exactly what your asking for.

comment: Hey rhino just paid for it, doesn't even show up.. anything you can do?
